data: Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) Induction EKM
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction Rapid Access to Consultative Expertise (RACE) line prior to initiating powerplan
Alert patients' community pharmacy of hospitalization and consider discontinuation of community opioid prescription if ordering buprenorphine-naloxone in hospital
Patient Care
Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale
Assess once at first sign of opioid withdrawal, q2h until COWS is 9, then q1h until COWS is greater than 12
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider when COWS score greater than 12
POC Urine Pregnancy Test
T;N, once
POC Urine Multi Drug Screen (Red Fish)
T;N, once
POC Fentanyl Urine Drug Screen
T;N, once
Medications
Provider MUST verify COWS is greater than 12 prior to first dose. Choose either buprenorphine-naloxone 24 Hour Induction OR buprenorphine-naloxone 3 Day Induction
24 Hour Induction
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
2 mg, sublingual, once, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: tab
4 mg, sublingual, once, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: tab
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider immediately if COWS score increases or patient reports worsening withdrawal at anytime
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
2 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
4 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN opioid withdrawal, drug form: tab
Provider MUST complete buprenorphine-naloxone maintenance order for ongoing therapy after first 24 hours
3 Day Induction
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
2 mg, sublingual, once, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: tab
4 mg, sublingual, once, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: tab
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
2 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN opioid withdrawal, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: tab
Notify Treating Provider

Notify provider immediately if COWS score increases or patient reports worsening withdrawal at anytime. Hold buprenorphine-naloxone and notify provider immediately if Pasero Opioid-Induced Sedation Scale (POSS) is 3 or greater
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
